channel.title: Proxmox,tailscale,homelab on Let's play with Linux
channel.description: Recent content in Proxmox,tailscale,homelab on Let's play with Linux

item.title: Ways to access your homelab and/or local network.
item.description: This post is going to be about having access to your local network when away. At the moment I’ll give my current setup as well as the tools I am using as a general guidline but I will give alternatives, links and a basic concept to follow in case you want to try another approach.
